actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act of 1965 to provide that all employees, other than bona fide executive, administrative, or professional employees, shall be considered to be service employees for purposes of such act.

summary.text: Amends the Service Contract Act of 1965 to stipulate that all employees, other than bona fide executive, administrative, or professional employees, shall be considered to be service employees subject to the minimum wage provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Service Contract Act of 1965 to provide that all employees, other than bona fide executive, administrative, or professional employees, shall be considered to be service employees for purposes of such act.
